short_description: gls windows is a windows & door shop based in harborough, united kingdom.
long_description: we specialise in the design, manufacture and installation of bespoke conservatories, orangeries, garden rooms & much more. we manufacture and install a wide range of window products including pvc-u double and triple glazed windows, sliding sash style, the list is endless. no matter the image it's framing, whether you're looking out or looking in, the art of crafting a truly exceptional window installation, the kind that grabs the attention of any passerby, is something we here at gls windows pride ourselves on. at gls, our passionate team have over 40 years of experience delivering exceptional services to our customers all across the midlands; from birmingham to leicester to northampton. our mission is to exceed customer expectations and that's what separates us from our competitors. we cover a range of regions, from northampton, nottingham, rugby and coventry. we also cover leicestershire and across the midlands. all of our windows and other products are manufactured in-house at our premises in cosby by a team with over 40 years' experience in the trade.

generated_description: gls windows is a company based in leicester, england, specializing in the design, manufacture, and installation of windows, doors, conservatories, and roofing products. with over 40 years of industry experience, the company offers a wide range of products including bi-fold doors, composite doors, upvc windows, timber-look windows, and double glazing windows. gls windows is known for its in-house manufacturing, utilizing the latest technology to produce energy-efficient and aesthetically pleasing window solutions. the company serves both domestic and commercial clients, providing services such as roof repairs, fascias and soffits, and warm roofs. gls windows is affiliated with fensa and the ggfi, ensuring high standards of quality and customer care.
